definition: To come across someone or something unexpectedly, often resulting in a chance encounter or meeting. It is commonly used to describe the act of unexpectedly running into someone you know or meeting someone by chance.

examples.german: Ich treffe meine Freunde im Park.
examples.english: I meet my friends in the park.

examples.german: Können wir uns um 18 Uhr treffen?
Er trifft immer die richtige Entscheidung.
examples.english: He always makes the right decision.

examples.german: Sie treffen sich regelmäßig zum Kaffeetrinken.
